channel.title: Posts on Omar-XinJiang
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Omar-XinJiang

item.title: Uyghur Pilaf
item.description: Fragrant rice pilaf gently cooked with carrots and onions, finished with raisins and a hint of cumin, served with your choice of tender lamb or beef.

item.title: Xinjiang Fried Rice Noodles
item.description: Xinjiang Fried Rice Noodles (also known as Xinjiang Chao Mifen or 新疆炒米粉) is a fiery, street-style stir-fried noodle dish bursting with the bold flavors of Xinjiang, China’s northwestern region.

item.title: Dapan Chicken
item.description: Dapan Chicken, also known as Big Plate Chicken or Da Pan Ji (大盘鸡), is one of the most beloved and iconic dishes from Xinjiang, the vast northwestern region of China.

item.title: Egg Noodles and Uyghur stir
item.description: Tangy, lightly spicy egg noodles with diced celery, served with pickled Mooli salad, cumin-scented beef with onions, and a canned soft drink.

item.title: Stir-Fried Chicken with Xinjiang Chili
item.description: Wok-fried chicken tossed over high heat with Xinjiang chillies, finished with a bold, fragrant chilli aroma.

item.title: Uyghur Stir-Fried Beef with Naan
item.description: Beef and onions stir-fried over high heat, then tossed with BBQ naan cubes for a bold, wok-charred aroma.

item.title: Grilled Chicken Wings
item.description: Chicken wings marinated in cumin, chilli, garlic, and grilled until smoky and crispy.

item.title: Grilled Lamb Chops
item.description: Marinated lamb chops grilled over open flame with cumin, chilli, garlic, and salt until charred and tender.

item.title: Ba He Li
item.description: Grilled tender lamb pieces with onions, peppers, cumin, and chilli in traditional style.

item.title: Cheese Buns
item.description: Baked soft buns filled with melty cheese, sometimes lightly herbed for a comforting bite.
